resources.string: இது பெரும்பாலான crdroid அமைப்புகளை தற்போதைய பயனருக்கான இயல்புநிலை மதிப்புகளுக்கு மீட்டமைக்கும். நீங்கள் தொடர விரும்புகிறீர்களா?
Restart SystemUI for change to take effect!
உங்கள் சாதனத்தில் #crDroidAndroid உள்ளதா எனப் பார்க்கவும் @ https://crdroid.net/
நாங்கள் திறந்த மூலத்தை விரும்புகிறோம், எங்களைப் பார்க்கவும்
டெலிகிராமில் புதிய உருவாக்கங்கள் பற்றிய அறிவிப்பைப் பெறுங்கள்
இந்த ROM-ஐ உங்கள் மொழியில் மொழிபெயர்க்க உதவிடுங்கள்!
இதில் ஆர்வம் இருந்தால், நாங்கள் அவர்களின் சேவையகங்களைப் பரிந்துரைக்கிறோம்

crDroid Android is an open-source project which needs your help to keep website online, our build servers running, and to deliver high-quality builds for your device.\n\n A small donation helps keep this project alive and improving. You can dismiss this message, but your support means a lot to us.
We still need €%,d this month. Help us reach our goal.
We appreciate all donations for this month. You can still contribute and make a difference!
Check for OTA update and links for your device
முகப்பு பொத்தானை அழுத்துவதன் மூலம் உள்வரும் அழைப்புகளுக்கு பதிலளிக்கவும்
அரை அழுத்தமானது, அழுத்தப்பட்டிருக்கும்போது மட்டும் திரையை இயக்கத்தில் வைத்திருக்கும்
ஒரு நீண்ட அழுத்தம் மற்றும் விடுவிப்பு கேமராவை தொடங்கும்
திரை அணைந்திருக்கும்போது Power - பொத்தானை நீண்டழுத்தி விளக்கைச் செயல்படுத்து
காட்சி முடக்கத்தில் இருக்கும்போது ஒலியளவு பொத்தானை நீண்ட நேரம் அழுத்துவதன் மூலம் இசைத் தடங்களைத் மாற்ற
ஒலி மேல்/ கீழ், கர்சரை இடது / வலது நோக்கி நகர்த்துகிறது
ஒலி மேல்/ கீழ், கர்சரை வலது/இடது நோக்கி நகர்த்துகிறது
பவர் பொத்தானை அழுத்தி நடப்பு அழைப்பைத் முடிக்கலாம்
ஒலியளவு விசைகளை அழுத்துவதன் மூலம் உள்வரும் அழைப்புகளுக்கு பதிலளிக்கலாம்
பகுதி திரைப்பிடிப்பு எடுக்க ஒளியளவு கீழ், மேல் பொத்தானை குறுகிய சொடுக்கு
திறந்திருக்கும்போது, ரெகோவரி அல்லது பூட்லோடர்-ஐ மறு-துவங்குவதற்கான பவர் பட்டியலில் தெரிவுகளைச் சேர்க்கவும்
Display advanced restart options on secured lockscreen
Make Luminance and Chroma selection affect secondary colors as well
Make luminance and chroma selection affect background colors as well
Unlock automatically if you input a correct PIN. This is slightly less secure than tapping Enter to confirm.
Customize device specific ambient display settings
Wake up the device instead of pulsing notifications
Pulse notifications on removal from pocket
Duration to vibrate when pulsing notifications
Settings based on sensors are subject to hardware compatibility. Enabling sensors for ambient display may increase power drain.
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Number of pulses for edge light
Set thickness for edge light bars
Show music ticker on Ambient Display during track change
Choose which status bar icons can be shown
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Double-tap on the status bar to put device asleep
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down quick settings
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Double-tap on the lock screen to put device asleep
நிலை பட்டியில் கடிகாரம் பக்கத்தில் நொடிகளைக் காட்டு
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
DateFormat இலிருக்க வேண்டும் எ. கா மாமா/தேதே/ஆஆ
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Display clock in quick status bar header
Display date in quick status bar header
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
நடப்பு பிணைய போக்குவரத்து நிலைகள் திரை மற்றும் தனிப்பயனாக்கு
Display an alert at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or VPN
Display navigation bar at bottom of screen
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Inverts the layout of the navigation bar and other items, such as the IME switcher
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Enabling this will disable hardware keys for navigation
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Display multiuser accessibility icon when available
Provide haptic feedback on changing brightness using slider
Provide haptic feedback on tapping QS tiles
ஒளிர்வைக்கு அருகில் உள்ள நகர்வுபலகை காட்சியை காட்டு
Use proper app icons for notification icons in statusbar
Display the number of pending notifications
Configure led color based on battery level and status
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'Add\'
Time to display heads up notifications
Display popup notifications only for alarm, dialer and messaging app
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Show separate indicator when any app uses mic or camera
Show separate indicator when any app uses location
Show indicator when device screen is projected
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when Do Not Disturb mode is active
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Brightness adjustment will only occur at the moment the screen is turned on
Show per-app volume button into volume dialog
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Force apps to ignore notch space
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup
Spoof your device as different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Remove existing face scan and create a new scan
Do you want to remove the existing face scan and create a new one?
Allow face unlock on lock screen
When the screen is turned on
Do not automatically turn off WiFi
WiFi will turn off after %1$s if no network connected
Do not automatically turn off Bluetooth
Bluetooth will turn off after %1$s if no devices connected
Your mobile hotspot\'s name won\'t appear in the list of available WLAN networks.
List and manage devices connected to the hotspot
List devices connected to the hotspot
This action will disconnect \"%1$s\" from this device and add it to blocklist
The device \"%1$s\" will be able to connect to this hotspot
No clients are currently available. Connected and blocked devices will be listed here when available.

resources.string: பாதுகாப்பான பூட்டுத் திரையில் சக்தி மெனுவை அணுக அனுமதிக்கவும்
Screen height valid for back gesture
Show force stop button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life.
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Replace clear all notification text with material style floating button
Show an animated arrow for back gesture.
Show an animated arrow for back gesture
Vibrate when performing a back gesture
Set opacity level for QS background
Display data usage summary in quick settings footer
மாற்றி ஒலியை ஒலிக்கசெய் திரைப்புடியை எடுக்கும் பொழுது
QS rows should be equal or greater than QQS rows. Use higher number of columns for circle / square (A11) QS tile style.
Setup icon pack and weather service
Requires custom weather service configured and smartspace disabled
Display current wind speed and direction
Pause media when volume is muted and resume it by increasing volume within the timeout
Automatically pauses media when the volume is muted and will resume automatically when volume is restored within the set time
Display a custom logo on left or right of the status bar
Show an overlay in the left bottom corner of the screen when something is copied to the clipboard
Block access to significant motion sensors for few battery intensive apps
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Show a floating rotate button when device is rotated
Spoof your device as different model for Netflix
Spoof your device as different model for Google Play Integrity
Determine if the device can connect to the internet, by contacting Google. Also used to detect captive portals.
Battery usage data will be lost
Display WiFi standard next to WiFi signal
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed for selected apps when they are locked. Heads up notifications will be automatically disabled.
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Prevent this application from showing up in any launcher. Requires a launcher restart for changes to take effect.
Display info when device is charging
For better visibility on bright images
Select an image to use for static mode
You must install a gallery app!
Control the granularity of each stream
Set schedule for always on display
Turns on from sunset till a time
Turns on from a time till sunrise
Show bluetooth dialog or toggle bluetooth state on tapping bluetooth tile
Display carrier name in the status bar
Show Ambient Display instead of fully waking the screen up
Quickly open apps in a floating window
Automatically clear clipboard at the scheduled time
Disable the private DNS when connected to a VPN and restore upon disconnecting
This allows you to downgrade applications. Note that this may lead to crashes and data corruption.
Show taskbar with selected navigation mode
Enable the input method quick switch feature to switch input methods or hide the on-screen keyboard from the feature bar at the bottom of the screen when typing
For changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
Load a custom keybox XML to override device key attestation
Custom keybox XML loaded. Delete to clear.
Not an XML file. Choose a valid keybox XML.
Invalid keybox XML: required fields missing
When enabled, do not enforce strong integrity from valid custom keybox and depend on Google Play Integrity spoof to fix apps like Google Pay
Forces darker colors in apps lacking dark mode. Some screens may appear off.
Force LTE carrier aggregation to work
Allow swipe down on lock screen to view Quick Settings
Display media cover art on Ambient display when available
Set media cover art fade level
Blur intensity when blur filter is applied
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Display visualizer bars with rounded corners
Set how many bars are shown in the visualizer
Set translucent background for notifications in QS
Set translucent background for notifications in lockscreen
Show lockscreen wallpaper on Ambient Display
Show seekbar squiggle animation in media panel when playing media
Perform key attestation to generate verified boot hash on boot. Requires system restart.
